msbt.message: Hello, hello, !As you can see, I'm busy making preparations for the fireworks show tonight. It starts at 7 PM sharp! Have you heard that we're planning to display custom fireworks during tonight's presentation as well?
It's still early, so there's quite a bit of time left before the fireworks show begins. Make sure to finish all your errands while it's still light out. You won't want to miss one minute of the show.
I'm counting down the seconds until the fireworks show at 7 PM.Of course, you should do something much more useful with your time until then.
Looks like the sun is turning in for the night, which means the main event is going to begin soon! I don't know about you, but all this anticipation has my heart racing!
I think the fireworks show is about to begin! This is going to be an evening to remember
I've prepared some lovely gifts as part of the fireworks show tonight, so remember to come see me later.
I must admit, I'm intrigued by what's happening at that stall over thereI suppose drawing a raffle ticket wouldn't be such a bad idea.

You haven't mentioned it, so I guess I'll just ask What do you think of my star bopper? Does it suit me? I like to dress up a bit on special occasions such as these, but I have been known to get carried away. But I've also been known to get carried away with the idea that I'm getting carried away!
Welcome to !We're hosting a fireworks show tonight at 7 PM. I hope you'll join us!
It's your lucky day! You happened to visit on the very same day we're hosting a fireworks show. It would make it that much more special to know we're sharing this event with some fresh faces.
I've prepared some lovely gifts as part of tonight's fireworks show.I hope you'll consider sticking around for the main event. I can't recommend it enough.
Yes! How can I be of assistance?
I've got a firework idea!
I'd like to chat.
We're still collecting ideas for tonight's show, so let me know if you come up with anything good. All you need to do is bring me your idea in the form of a custom design. I'll take care of the rest!

Doesn't that sound so exciting?Right now I need to make myself available to any visitor needing my assistance, so I'm a bit distracted. But if that situation changes, I'll be free to accept possible fireworks ideas. I'd love to see yours! All you have to do is bring me your idea in the form of a custom design, and I can take it from there.
That's what I was hoping you'd say! Can I take a look at it?
Another one? How wonderful! Let's take a look at your latest design.
Nothing to show me, after all? Well, if you change your mind, you know where to find me.
Oh, so you don't want to add any custom-design fireworks to the show, then? That's too bad. You can always let me know if you change your mind.
I'm sorry, but the fireworks show is over, so I can't accept any more ideas tonight.But I look forward to receiving and admiring your designs the next time we have a fireworks show!
Oh, wow! My high expectations have certainly been met.Leave the rest to me. I'll make sure everything's in order for the show.
Amazing! I can't wait to see your work lighting up the night sky.I'll get everything prepped in time for launch tonight.

Oh, how wonderful! I'm so curious to see what you've come up with.Unfortunately, at the moment I need to stay available for any visitors who may require my assistance. When that's no longer the case, I'll start accepting fireworks again. Be sure to come back then, OK?
The fireworks show has begun! I'm glad you made it, .
I'm honored that you're here for 's fireworks show!We may not be the fireworks capital of the world, but I think you'll be impressed by our presentation.
I have a little something for everyone as a part of today's event.

I got everyone a little something as part of today's event, but I don't think it'll fit in your pockets. If you'd like to see what I've got up my sleeve, come back after you've had a chance to make some space. Just make sure you get it from me before midnight, since that's when the fireworks end!
You'll shine as bright as the fireworks in the sky while wearing your . Another added benefit is that it'll make you easy to spot! It can get pretty dark out here at night.
Are you enjoying the fireworks show? Oh, before I forget!I'm still holding onto your gift. Well, here you go.
Seeing the sky so full of color is simply magical. I can't help but shout my appreciation to the sky above! It's justsoBEAUTIFUL!
If you want the best view of the fireworks, tilt up on  to see the full night sky in all its glory!
There's something about watching fireworks with someone by your side that makes it all the lovelier
The fireworks show has barely begun, and I'm already blown out of the water. Make sure you appreciate this evening to the fullest!
There's still quite a bit of show left. I hope you're ready for even more fireworks. I know I am!
Aw, the show's almost over. I hope you plan on staying until the very end. I couldn't tear myself away
Did any custom-design fireworks catch your eye?Sometimes we choreograph the fireworks so the custom designs appear in a set order together. Keep your eyes on the sky if you don't want to miss them.
If you ask me, there's no better place to enjoy a fireworks show than right here on .
I'd love to hear what you think of the fireworks.It looks like you're enjoying yourself!
As I stand here, seeing all the island's residents gathered in the plaza, their faces lit by fireworks I can't help but feel beyond grateful that I decided to take this job.
I spend most of my time inside Resident Services, but I love when I get the chance to work outside. I might even say that it's the best part of this job!
So, the bad news is that was the last fireworks show of the year.The good news? Now we can look forward to next year's offerings!
I think it's appropriate that the last fireworks show also marks the start of a new season. The best part about endings is that they open up all kinds of possibilities for new beginnings.

Well, at least that last fireworks show was a true success.Tomorrow everything'll be back to normal, and I'll be behind the desk, working Resident Services again. But now I'm feeling extra inspired to give it my all!
I guess after tonight, I'll have to retire my star bopper for the year. It's a shameI really love wearing it.
Have you noticed that it feels almost eerily quiet after a fireworks show? I miss all the excitement.
I love the fact that even visitors here on get the chance to enjoy our fireworks shows. Of course they're not a daily occurrence, but I hope you know you're welcome here anytime.
Next Sunday we'll be lighting up the sky again with even more fireworks!If you stop by, I may have another special gift for you. Something you don't have yet
A fireworks show like that will always get my adrenaline pumping!I can't wait to bring this energy to my work at Resident Services tomorrow. I'll be so productive!
Oof. Why am I suddenly so tired Oh yeah! I've been out here, working on my feet all day long. I suppose it's time to turn in for the night. Make sure you get plenty of rest too, .

But please allow me to officially introduce myself. I'm Isabelle!I have the day off today, but usually you can find me at Resident Services, always ready to lend a helping hand. That's enough introductions for now. Let's get back to chatting about how much we love fireworks!
